full_text: Financial decisions are no longer the preserve of men alone. Women control about a third of household wealth in America, and the share is likely to rise https://t.co/guqj6ps7F5

财务决定不再是男人的专利。在美国，妇女控制着大约三分之一的家庭财富，而且这一比例可能会上升https://t.co/guqj6ps7F5。
